==History==
*This book was removed in [[0.31]] with the replacement of form spells by [[talisman]]s.
*In [[0.18]], [[Stoneskin]] was removed.
*In [[0.16]], [[Ice Form]] was replaced by [[Irradiate]] and [[Hydra Form]].
*In [[0.14]], [[Polymorph]] was removed.
*In [[0.12]], [[Condensation Shield]] was replaced by [[Polymorph]].
